name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.AddHttpRequestTypeParameter
displayName: Add `HttpRequest` type parameter for implemented interfaces
description: Add an `HttpRequest` type parameter to a class `implements` statement for interfaces that have been generically parameterized where they previously specified `HttpRequest` explicitly.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.AddTestResourcesClientDependencyIfNeeded
description: Add the `micronaut-test-resources-client` dependency to pom.xml if `test.resources.client.enabled property=true`.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.BeanPropertyCapitalizationStrategy
description: As of Micronaut 3.x property names for getters like `getXForwarded()` are de-capitalized from `XForwarded` to `xForwarded`.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.ChangeAnnotationProcessorPath
description: Change the groupId, artifactId, and version of a Maven annotation processor path.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
options: [{"name":"oldGroupId","type":"String","displayName":"Old groupId","description":"The old groupId to replace. The groupId is the first part of a plugin coordinate 'com.google.guava:guava:VERSION'. name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.FixDeprecatedExceptionHandlerConstructors
description: Adds `ErrorResponseProcessor` argument to deprecated no-arg `ExceptionHandler` constructors.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.OncePerRequestHttpServerFilterToHttpServerFilter
description: Starting in Micronaut 3.0 all filters are executed once per request. Directly implement `HttpServerFilter` instead of extending `OncePerRequestHttpServerFilter` and replace any usages of `micronaut.once` attributes with a custom attribute name.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.ProviderImplementationsToMicronautFactories
description: As of Micronaut 3.x the `@Factory` annotation is required for creating beans from `javax.inject.Provider get()` implementations.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.RemoveAnnotationProcessorPath
description: Remove the Maven annotation processor path that matches the given groupId and artifactId.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.SubclassesReturnedFromFactoriesNotInjectable
displayName: Change factory method return types to reflect their resolved return type
description: As of Micronaut 3.x It is no longer possible to inject the internal implementation type from beans produced via factories. Factory method return types are changed to reflect the resolved return type if the method returns a single non-null type that does not match the method declaration return type.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

description: This recipe will update relocated security config keys in Micronaut configuration property files.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.AddSnakeYamlDependencyIfNeeded
description: This recipe will add the `snakeyaml` dependency to a Micronaut 4 application that uses yaml configuration.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.CopyNonInheritedAnnotations
displayName: Copy non-inherited annotations from super class
description: As of Micronaut 3.x only [annotations](https://github.com/micronaut-projects/micronaut-core/blob/3.0.x/src/main/docs/guide/appendix/breaks.adoc#annotation-inheritance) that are explicitly meta-annotated with `@Inherited` are inherited from parent classes and interfaces.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.TypeRequiresIntrospection
displayName: Add `@Introspected` to classes requiring a map representation
description: In Micronaut 2.x a reflection-based strategy was used to retrieve that information if the class was not annotated with `@Introspected`. As of Micronaut 3.x it is required to annotate classes with `@Introspected` that are used in this way.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.micronaut.Micronaut2to3Migration
description: This recipe will apply changes required for migrating from Micronaut 2 to Micronaut 3.
category1Description: Recipes for upgrading and patching [Micronaut](https://micronaut.io/) applications.
category2Description: Basic building blocks for transforming Java code.
